## Structure of the book {-}

Chapter \@ref(intro) gives a quick overview of R and its evolution over the last 
2 decades. Chapter \@ref(installation) acts as a guide for installing R and 
RStudio. Chapters \@ref(variables) and \@ref(datatypes) introduce the reader to 
variables and data types in R. Chapter \@ref(help) shows the right place and right
way to ask for help. Chapters \@ref(vectors) to \@ref(lists) introduce the basic 
data structures in R. Chapter \@ref(packages) explores the R package system.
